meanings.definition: The act of going up to the land of Israel.
meanings.sent1: Her aliyah to Israel was a dream come true.
meanings.sent2: Many families make aliyah to Israel for a fresh start.
meanings.sent3: The cat's aliyah to the top of the tree was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: His career took an aliyah after he got promoted.
meanings.sent5: The hot air balloon's aliyah into the sky was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: An immigration of Jews to Israel.
meanings.sent1: The aliyah of Jewish people to Israel is a significant event.
meanings.sent2: My grandparents were part of the aliyah to Israel in the 1940s.
meanings.sent3: The aliyah of Jewish families brought new traditions to the community.
meanings.sent4: The aliyah of Jews to Israel symbolizes hope and unity.
meanings.sent5: The aliyah of Jewish immigrants enriched Israeli culture.

meanings.definition: A rise in status or rank.
meanings.sent1: His aliyah in the company came after years of hard work.
meanings.sent2: The singer's aliyah to fame happened overnight.
meanings.sent3: The cat's aliyah to ruler of the house was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her aliyah to leadership was well-deserved.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's aliyah to champion was celebrated by all.
